p: None of the other Aedes mosquito pools were positive for DENV in Eriyawetiya study area or other study and control areas. Further, none of the Aedes dengue vector mosquito eggs and larvae pools tested to detect vertical transmission of DENV were positive. The level of vertical transmission of DENV is rarely detected in the field even though the phenomenon is an important strategy to explain arboviral disease transmission in nature [ 41, 42].
